Address.label: Address
Address.value: 600 NORTH BRIDGE ROAD,12-02/03, PARKVIEW SQUARE, SINGAPORE, 188778, Singapore

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Basel Medical aims to be a one-stop integrated healthcare provider for all musculoskeletal-related medical care, including post-surgery rehabilitation services such as physiotherapy as well as other ancillary services such as pain management. We operate our two clinics at Gleneagles Medical Centre in Singapore and currently have five medical practitioners practicing with Basel Medical, comprising four orthopedic specialists and one neurosurgery specialist. The services provided by our clinics include, but are not limited to, consultation, medical diagnosis and medical or surgical treatments for orthopedic, trauma, sports medicine and neurological conditions and our clinics are equipped with the facilities needed to perform a variety of procedures on site and minor surgical services, while more complex surgical procedures are performed at operating theaters of other hospitals with such facilities.
